meanings.sent1: She vamooses from the party when it started raining.
meanings.sent2: He always vamooses as soon as the clock strikes five.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel vamooses up the tree when it sees the cat.
meanings.sent4: The idea of failure makes him vamooses like a startled deer.
meanings.sent5: The sound of thunder made the birds vamooses from the trees.

meanings.sent1: Their vamooses surprised everyone at the event.
meanings.sent2: The thief's vamooses left the room in chaos.
meanings.sent3: The cat's vamooses from the room was comical to watch.
meanings.sent4: The sudden vamooses of the bus caused a stir among the passengers.
meanings.sent5: The vamooses of the students after the bell rang was like a stampede.
